text: Rui Manuel Parente Chancerelle de Machete (born 7 April 1940) is a Portuguese politician. Machete served as Minister of Social Affairs from 1976 to 1979, Minister of Justice from 1983 to 1985, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of National Defense in 1985, and Minister of State and Foreign Affairs from 2013 to 2015. He was the leader of the Social Democratic Party in 1985. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Portugal Category:Foreign ministers of Portugal Category:Justice ministers of Portugal Category:Ministers of National Defence of Portugal Category:Social Democratic Party (Portugal) politicians Category:People from Setúbal
title: Rui Machete
